sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GNOME Utilities package contains gnome-system-log, gnome-search-tool, gnome-dictionary, and gfloppy.

sect3.title: gnome-system-log
sect3.para: gnome-system-log allows you to monitor and view system log files.

sect3.title: gnome-search-tool
sect3.para: gnome-search-tool allows you to search for files on your system using simple and advanced search options.

sect3.title: gnome-dictionary
sect3.para: gnome-dictionary allows you to look up definitions and spelling of words.

sect3.title: gfloppy
sect3.para: gfloppy formats floppy disks under Linux.
